name: Tilt Maze (itch) (MrMitchGazz)
description:
Hey there, just wanted to give you a heads up about an issue in the game I've been working on. Unfortunately, the collider feature isn't working properly at the moment. However, the game is still playable and the objective is to tilt the maze using finger gestures on a mobile device to guide the ball towards one of the randomly spawned green cubes to win.

I've noticed that the tilt script is still a bit buggy, but I'm working on fixing it. Additionally, I'm planning on creating a UI main canvas screen to improve the overall game experience.

Sorry for any inconvenience this may cause, but I'm doing my best to get everything up and running smoothly. I'll be sure to keep you posted on any updates!
